scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --max-old-space-size=4096 -r ./load-env -r newrelic -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register dist/index.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development pnpm prisma generate && nodemon -r ./load-env -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.start:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=local ts-node -r ./load-env -r newrelic -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.migrate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env.development -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.production -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:dev:reset: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env.development -- prisma migrate reset
scripts.migrate:prod:reset: cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.production -- prisma migrate reset
scripts.migrate:dev:status: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env.development -- prisma migrate status
scripts.migrate:prod:status: cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.production -- prisma migrate status
scripts.migrate:dev:resolve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env.development -- prisma migrate resolve
scripts.migrate:prod:resolve: cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.production -- prisma migrate resolve
scripts.db:push:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env.development -- prisma db push
scripts.db:push:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.production -- prisma db push
